name: Shinonome the Vaylantz Priestess
effectText: During your Main Phase, if you control this Special Summoned card: You can add 1 "Vaylantz" Spell from your Deck to your hand. If this card in the Monster Zone moves to another Monster Zone: You can add 1 "Vaylantz" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Shinonome the Vaylantz Priestess". You can only use each effect of "Shinonome the Vaylantz Priestess" once per turn.
pendEffect: During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon this card to your Main Monster Zone in its same column, also you cannot Special Summon non-"Vaylantz" monsters for the rest of this turn, except from the Extra Deck. You can only use this effect of "Shinonome the Vaylantz Priestess" once per turn.
